text: Thrice Resurrected () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Gaidai.За что Пес Барбос ненавидел МоргуноваТРИЖДЫ ВОСКРЕСШИЙ It stars Alla Larionova, Georgi Kulikov, and Natalya Medvedeva. == Actors == * Alla Larionova – Svetlana Sergeyevna * Georgi Kulikov – Arkady Nikolayevich Shmelyov * Natalya Medvedeva – Anna Mikhailovna Shmelyova * Vsevolod Sanayev – Ivan Aleksandrovich Starodub * Konstantin Sorokin – Vasily Vasilyevich Kiselyov * Nikolay Bogolyubov – Kazansky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai
title: Thrice Resurrected
